mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT nin_setting.id AS id, course_id AS courseId, user_type AS userType, course_name AS courseName, open_state AS openState, open_time AS openTime, close_time AS closeTime FROM nin_setting INNER JOIN nin_course ON nin_setting.course_id = nin_course.id WHERE nin_setting.open_state = 2 UNION ALL SELECT nin_setting.id AS id, course_id AS courseId, user_type AS userType, course_name AS courseName, open_state AS openState, null AS openTime, null AS closeTime FROM nin_setting INNER JOIN nin_course ON nin_setting.course_id = nin_course.id WHERE nin_setting.open_state != 2) AS a WHERE a.userType = #{userType}
AND a.courseName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{courseName}, '%')
